Package camzup.pfriendly

Interface IUpOgl

All Superinterfaces:
IUp
All Known Implementing Classes:
Up3, UpOgl, Yup2, Yup3, Zup3
public interface IUpOgl extends IUp
Maintains consistent behavior across OpenGL renderers, even when they are of different dimensions.

    TEXT_BLEND
    Flag to indicate the blend mode should be set to the old Processing OpenGL blend mode for the purposes of displaying text.

    • MAX_LIGHTS

      static final int MAX_LIGHTS
      Duplicate of PGL.MAX_LIGHTS. Maximum lights by default is 8, the minimum defined by OpenGL.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TEXT_BLEND

      static final int TEXT_BLEND
      Flag to indicate the blend mode should be set to the old Processing OpenGL blend mode for the purposes of displaying text.
